verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Manifested <S%G5319><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Tiberias. <S%G5085><s%> <S%G5319><s%> And He Manifested Himself <S%G1161><s%> Thus : <S%G3779><s%>

There Were <S%G2258><s%> Together <S%G3674><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thomas <S%G2381><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> Didymus, <S%G1324><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> <S%G3588><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Cana <S%G2580><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Sons <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Others <S%G243><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Two. <S%G1417><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> I Go <S%G5217><s%> To Fish. <S%G232><s%> They Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Thee. <S%G4671><s%> They Went Forth <S%G1831><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Went Up <S%G305><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%>, Immediately, <S%G2117><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> During <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> They Took <S%G4084><s%> Nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

<S%G4405><s%> And Morning <S%G1161><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Being Come <S%G1096><s%> Stood <S%G2476><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shore; <S%G123><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> However <S%G3305><s%> Knew <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> It Is. <S%G2076><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3813><s%> Little Children, <S%G3361><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Food <S%G4371><s%> Have Ye? <S%G2192><s%> They Answered <S%G611><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> No. <S%G3756><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Cast <S%G906><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Right <S%G1188><s%> Side <S%G3313><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Net, <S%G1350><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Shall Find. <S%G2147><s%> They Cast <S%G906><s%> Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Longer <S%G2089><s%> It <S%G846><s%> To Draw <S%G1670><s%> Were They Able <S%G2480><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fishes. <S%G2486><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> That Disciple <S%G1565><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Peter, <S%G4074><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> It Is. <S%G2076><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> It Is, <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Upper Garment <S%G1903><s%> He Girded On, <S%G1241><s%> <S%G2258><s%> For He Was <S%G1063><s%> Naked, <S%G1131><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cast <S%G906><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea. <S%G2281><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Small Ship <S%G4142><s%> Came, <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Were They <S%G2258><s%> Far <S%G3112><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Land, <S%G1093><s%> ' <S%G235><s%> But <S%G5613><s%> Somewhere About <S%G575><s%> Cubits <S%G4083><s%> Two Hundred, <S%G1250><s%> Dragging <S%G4951><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Net <S%G1350><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Fishes. <S%G2486><s%>

When <S%G5613><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> They Went Up <S%G576><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> They See <S%G991><s%> A Fire Of Coals <S%G439><s%> Lying <S%G2749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fish <S%G3795><s%> Lying On It, <S%G1945><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bread. <S%G740><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Bring <S%G5342><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fishes <S%G3795><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye Took <S%G4084><s%> Just Now. <S%G3568><s%>

Went Up <S%G305><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Drew <S%G1670><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Net <S%G1350><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Land, <S%G1093><s%> Full <S%G3324><s%> Of Fishes <S%G2486><s%> Large <S%G3173><s%> A Hundred And <S%G1540><s%> Fifty Three; <S%G4004><s%> <S%G5140><s%> And Though <S%G2532><s%> So Many <S%G5118><s%> There Were <S%G5607><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Was Not Rent <S%G4977><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Net. <S%G1350><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Come Ye, <S%G1205><s%> Dine. <S%G709><s%> <S%G3762><s%> But None <S%G1161><s%> Ventured <S%G5111><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> To Ask <S%G1833><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Art? <S%G1488><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> It Is. <S%G2076><s%>

Comes <S%G2064><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Takes <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bread <S%G740><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gives <S%G1325><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fish <S%G3795><s%> In Like Manner. <S%G3668><s%>

This Is <S%G5124><s%> Now <S%G2235><s%> The Third Time <S%G5154><s%> Was Manifested <S%G5319><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%>, To His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Having Been Raised <S%G1453><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead. <S%G3498><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> They Had Dined, <S%G709><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Simon Son <S%G4613><s%>, Of Jonah, <S%G2495><s%> Lovest Thou <S%G25><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> More <S%G4119><s%> Than These? <S%G5130><s%> <S%G5130><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Knowest <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Have Affection For <S%G5368><s%> Thee. <S%G4571><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Feed <S%G1006><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G721><s%> My Lambs. <S%G3450><s%>

He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> A Second Time, <S%G1208><s%> Simon Son <S%G4613><s%> Of Jonah, <S%G2495><s%> Lovest Thou <S%G25><s%> Me? <S%G3165><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Knowest <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Have Affection For <S%G5368><s%> Thee. <S%G4571><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Shepherd <S%G4165><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sheep <S%G4263><s%> My. <S%G3450><s%>

He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third Time, <S%G5154><s%> Simon Son <S%G4613><s%>, Of Jonah, <S%G2495><s%> Hast Thou Affection For <S%G5368><s%> Me? <S%G3165><s%> Was Grieved <S%G3076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third Time, <S%G5154><s%> Hast Thou Affection For <S%G5368><s%> Me? <S%G3165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Knowest; <S%G1492><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Knowest <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Have Affection For <S%G5368><s%> Thee. <S%G4571><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Feed <S%G1006><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4263><s%> My Sheep. <S%G3450><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Thou Wast <S%G2258><s%> Younger <S%G3501><s%> Thou Girdedst <S%G2224><s%> Thyself, <S%G4572><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Walkedst <S%G4043><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Thou Didst Desire; <S%G2309><s%> <S%G3752><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> Thou Shalt Be Old <S%G1095><s%> Thou Shalt Stretch Forth <S%G1614><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Thy Hands, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Shall Gird, <S%G2224><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bring Thee <S%G5342><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Dost Not Desire. <S%G2309><s%>

<S%G5124><s%> But This <S%G1161><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> Signifying <S%G4591><s%> By What <S%G4169><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> He Should Glorify <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Having Said <S%G2036><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> Me. <S%G3427><s%>

<S%G1994><s%> But Having Turned <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Sees <S%G991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciple <S%G3101><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Following, <S%G190><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Reclined <S%G377><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Supper <S%G1173><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4738><s%> His Breast <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Is It <S%G2076><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Delivering Up <S%G3860><s%> Thee? <S%G4571><s%>

Him <S%G5126><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3778><s%> But Of This One <S%G1161><s%> What; <S%G5101><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> I Desire <S%G2309><s%> To Abide <S%G3306><s%> Till <S%G2193><s%> I Come, <S%G2064><s%> What Is It <S%G5101><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Thee? <S%G4571><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> Me. <S%G3427><s%>

Went Out <S%G1831><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> This Word <S%G3778><s%> Among <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> That Disciple <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Does Not Die. <S%G599><s%> However <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Does Not Die; <S%G599><s%> ' But, <S%G235><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> I Desire <S%G2309><s%> To Abide <S%G3306><s%> Till <S%G2193><s%> I Come, <S%G2064><s%> What Is It <S%G5101><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Thee? <S%G4571><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciple <S%G3101><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Bears Witness <S%G3140><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> These Things, <S%G5130><s%> And Who <S%G2532><s%> Wrote <S%G1125><s%> These Things : <S%G5023><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> We Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> True <S%G227><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3141><s%> His Witness. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2076><s%> And There Are <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Other Things <S%G243><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> Did <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> They Should Be Written <S%G1125><s%> ' <S%G2596><s%> One By One, <S%G1520><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> Itself <S%G846><s%> I Suppose <S%G3633><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Would Contain <S%G5562><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> Books. <S%G975><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
